MS.S: Carbon is a PowerShell module for automating the configuration Windows 7, 8, 2008, and 2012 and automation the installation and configuration of Windows applications, websites, and services. It can configure and manage:_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_ * Local users and groups_x000D__x000A_ * IIS websites, virtual directories, and applications_x000D__x000A_ * File system, registry, and certificate permissions_x000D__x000A_ * Certificates_x000D__x000A_ * Privileges_x000D__x000A_ * Services_x000D__x000A_ * Encryption_x000D__x000A_ * Junctions_x000D__x000A_ * Hosts file_x000D__x000A_ * INI files_x000D__x000A_ * Performance counters_x000D__x000A_ * Shares_x000D__x000A_ * .NET connection strings and app settings_x000D__x000A_ * And much more!_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_All functions are idempotent: when run multiple times with the same arguments, your system will be in the same state without failing or producing errors.
Aaron Jensen and WebMD Health Services
Aaron Jensen and WebMD Health Services

Carbon is a PowerShell module for automating the configuration Windows 7, 8, 2008, and 2012 and automation the installation and configuration of Windows applications, websites, and services. It can configure and manage:_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_ * Local users and groups_x000D__x000A_ * IIS websites, virtual directories, and applications_x000D__x000A_ * File system, registry, and certificate permissions_x000D__x000A_ * Certificates_x000D__x000A_ * Privileges_x000D__x000A_ * Services_x000D__x000A_ * Encryption_x000D__x000A_ * Junctions_x000D__x000A_ * Hosts file_x000D__x000A_ * INI files_x000D__x000A_ * Performance counters_x000D__x000A_ * Shares_x000D__x000A_ * .NET connection strings and app settings_x000D__x000A_ * And much more!_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_All functions are idempotent: when run multiple times with the same arguments, your system will be in the same state without failing or producing errors.
